description:
With this app you can send quickly and easily a memo to yourself. 
Features:
- Capture text
- Capture foto
- Capture audio (min. webOS 2)
- Just Type integration (min. webOS 2)

Basically it enables you to capture your thoughts by entering text, taking a picture or recording your voice and send them over to your email inbox with just a few touches.
The app also supports "just type" which was introduced with webOS 2.0.

If you are familiar with GTD this is the perfect companion to assist you during the first phase of GTD, the capture and collect phase. Everything goes straight to your email inbox, where you then can process your input.

If you use the Evernote app this also might be a great time safer, since the Evernote webos app is a bit cumbersome to use if things have to go real fast. Just provide your "secret" Evernote email adress and your thoughts will go straight to your Evernote account.

Foto capture does not work on the TouchPad, because the HP stock camera app does not work like on the Pre.

If you find bugs your comments & feedback is welcome.
